sub_title: Procurement & Supply Chain | Strategy | Customer Experience | Business Consultant | Negotiation Expert |Sustainability | Operations Management
summary:
I have spent the past 12+ years in the FMCG, Manufacturing, Tech and Finance industries delivering topline sustainable savings, growing revenue, Implementing strategic project for business growth, coaching and training teams on complex bilateral negotiations and change management. As a Senior Business consultant, Project Manager and Global Procurement professional, I have managed several global categories delivering sustainable year-on-year cost savings, increasing cash flow and executing Green and Brownfield projects.

I have worked and lived in 5 different countries within the last 8 years gaining invaluable people and cultural experience which aids my communication, coaching and training abilities. I am passionate about developing and leading individuals and teams.


The Gap Partnership Alumni Member

Fluent in English, Basic French and learning Dutch

Entrepreneurial mindset!

company.name: Philips Domestic Appliances

profile_positions.description:
Lead Negotiation Excellence as Trusted Advisor, Senior Consultant and Strategic Partner for Philips DA.
Build and Implement Philips DA Procurement Negotiation Strategy globally
Develop and deploy Game Theory trainings and Bilateral Negotiation Coaching to the Global Procurement function
Lead with a team of 5 the development and implementation of the Procurement Negotiation strategy for all Business units of Philips DA
profile_positions.title: Negotiation Excellence Lead

company.name: The HEINEKEN Company

profile_positions.description:
Led the Global strategic description, planning, sourcing, and contracting of crown-corks for 70 operating countries globally that helped deliver sustainable y-o-y cost reductions, fully mitigate commodity & Fx impact and improved top line growth.
Implemented  sustainable consumer value engineering projects which delivered year-on-year cost reductions and reduced the CO2 emissions across all regions.
Managed the Steel commodity sourcing and hedging through supplier partnerships.
Led the Design to Sustainable (DSV) Pilot project for Brazil which functioned to deliver value-in, cost out and sustainable growth by benchmarking with external competition.
profile_positions.title: Global Category Lead Crowncorks

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Global sourcing and contracting of crown-corks and aluminium bottles for about 70 operating countries globally.
Responsible for the Project Management and implementation of all sustainability projects for the two categories globally.
Responsible for the global strategic description, planning and implementation for the two categories.
profile_positions.title: Global Category Buyer Metal Packaging

profile_positions.description: Managed the sourcing of all locally produced raw, packaging materials and Creatives for Heineken Uk and delivered 15% reduction in spend within a 6-months period.
profile_positions.title: Raw & Packaging Buyer

profile_positions.description:
Led tenders on IT & Business services categories 
Achieved 50% savings reduction in leasing cost of printers and optimized printing policy.
Developed automated Procurement dashboard for reporting KPI's and operations to top management 
Analyzed best E-invoicing solutions for managing various categories of suppliers and further improve the auto-matching rate of invoices 
Provided visibility on the spend data of the wholesale business by cleaning up the data and proper category classification
profile_positions.title: Procurement Operation Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Developed the strategy on Inbound logistics with a business case focusing on all major direct materials  transported by road.
Performed analysis on the directs sourcing category to determine opportunities in road transport 
Benchmark logistics sourcing approach and improvements on WOW.
profile_positions.title: Global Category Buyer Logistics

company.name: Unilever

profile_positions.description:
Led the migration to handheld POS devices and training of all sales reps across the key regions in Nigeria 
Supported the Regional team in closing resource gaps on all routes to market activities.
Supervised fleet management for all key distributors in Nigeria 
Piloted a pre-selling methodology in the Open Market to explore its viability which gave an incremental sales growth of 25%.
profile_positions.title: Customer Development Programs Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
With a direct report to the Procurement Operations Director Central Africa; I was responsible for the coordination of all value improvement savings projects across CA.
Led the management and improvement of the PtP process to local and foreign vendors for Central Africa.
Implemented best practices from other regions in various procurement operations including PtP, reducing inventory levels, supplier payment term improvement initiatives to increase working capital for the region.
Worked with the regional treasury team to implement currency and monetary risk management on foreign currency purchases
profile_positions.title: Procurement Operations Excellence Manager - Central Africa

profile_positions.description:
Purchase all chemicals and commodities for Unilever Nigeria 
Ensure stock levels are kept lean to reduce holding cost of inventory whilst ensuring constant supply to factory
Manage supplier relationship
Implement global deals and contracts to country level procurement 
Price forecasting for product pricing and gross margin value analysis 
Maintaining material supply and availability to factory operations and supplier Risk management
Liaison with import financier to manage and improve payment on time to local and foreign vendors.
Regional and country value improvement / savings project initiation and implementation.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Operations Assistant Manager - Chemicals, Oils and Fats

profile_positions.description:
Ensure all company CRQS are met whilst ensuring quality of all products manufactured. 
Product quality improvement 
Intercompany quality contract agreement preparation and compliance
Company Quality culture improvement driver
Ensure processes needed for the Quality Management System (QMS) are established, implemented and maintained.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Assistant Manager

company.name: Marine Power

profile_positions.description:
Managed a Power plant site of 20 FTEs delivering on savings, safety, and stakeholder engagement.
Increased the sales and commercial output of the Power plant from 25% to 70% by signing up various multinationals & govt. establishments to the power grid.
Prepare and monitor division budget requirements and expenditure 
Developed and executed the sales and operations strategy collaborating with the leadership team to define new business goals
Evaluate hazardous conditions and recommend engineering controls, administrative controls, personal protective equipment's and training for employees.
profile_positions.title: Strategy & Operations Manager

company.name: intercontinental bank PLC

profile_positions.description:
Control payment of all financial requests for day to day running of bank.
Translated loan recovery strategy into tangible budgets and targets to optimize resource allocations.
profile_positions.title: Finance Officer

company.name: Delton Computers

profile_positions.description: Was responsible for the global and regional sourcing of all hardware & software. Also managed the sales and new business development/ orders.
profile_positions.title: Procurement & Sales Manager

company.name: Kids Clean Club

volunteer_experiences.description:
KIDS CLEAN CLUB is an expression of The Mental and Environmental Development Initiative for Children –MEDIC (CAC/IT/NO 48306) a non‐governmental and pro‐human organization that aims at a total positive transformation and development of the child.
To instil in every child, the trait of Global Cleanliness, Global Safety and Patriotism and to reach every Home, School, and Religious Institution through the Children.

volunteer_experiences.description: Volunteer at Hillsong Amsterdam as a host to welcome people to all events. Also ensure all queries and needs are addressed.
